channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:41 Driven the alarm to the Kiev region. Follow the following messages.
item.description: 游릭 04:41 Driven the alarm to the Kiev region. Follow the following messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 04:23 Drive anxiety in the Uman District. Watch for further messages.
